product_description: Become a drying superhero with the PFM Terry Weave Drying Towel, a must-have in your car cleaning supplies collection. This ultra-premium microfiber towel delivers unmatched absorbency and convenience. Featuring a dense 1,120 GSM weight and a long-loop, double-sided terry weave, it holds up to 5 pounds of water, making quick work of even the largest vehicles. This PFM terry weave drying towel creates more surface area for rapid absorption while reducing drag and surface tension for a smooth, streak-free pass. Just lay it flat, drag it across your paint, and watch the water vanish—no heavy pressure needed. Our car cleaning cloth is generously sized at 25" x 35" for maximum coverage, and double-lined to trap more water with each swipe. Rounded, satin-trimmed edges prevent scratches and increase durability, making this drying towel for cars a long-lasting addition to your car care kit. And when you're done, just toss it in the wash—this auto drying towel machine washable and built to last through many uses.

product_description: Chemical Guys Woolly Mammoth Large Microfiber Drying Towel (MIC1995) is designed to deliver maximum drying power for car lovers, enthusiasts, and professional detailers. Oversized and ultra-plush, it is built to handle even the largest vehicles with ease while leaving behind a streak-free finish every time. Measuring 36 x 25 inches, the Woolly Mammoth Chemical Guys towels feature an advanced microfiber blend with thick, dense fibers that hold over a gallon of water. This massive absorption capacity allows you to dry full-sized cars, trucks, SUVs, motorcycles, boats, and RVs in record time. The towel glides effortlessly across paintwork, glass, and chrome, gently lifting water without dragging or scratching the surface. The ultra-soft fibers are specially designed to prevent swirl marks, streaks, and water spots, making it a safer and more effective alternative to traditional drying methods like chamois or cotton towels. Its plush texture ensures that every wipe leaves behind a clean, glossy surface while protecting the finish of delicate automotive and household surfaces alike. Engineered for durability, the Woolly Mammoth drying towel remains soft, fluffy, and absorbent even after repeated washes. Strong stitching and premium microfiber construction help the towel maintain its performance through years of use, making it a reliable choice for both enthusiasts and professionals. Beyond cars and trucks, this versatile towel is perfect for drying boats, RVs, motorcycles, and even delicate household surfaces like mirrors, shower glass, and windows. Whether for quick weekend washes or full professional detailing sessions, the Woolly Mammoth towel is the ultimate tool for your car detailing kit, achieving spotless, streak-free drying on any surface. This automotive drying towel is great for car enthusiasts.

product_description: The Dreadnought MAX is the next evolution in drying towels! Made with a long pile twist microfiber weave, with an extra layer of microfiber sandwiched in-between, the third layer helps wick away moisture from the surface loops and prevents moisture from soaking through to the other side. The extra layer also makes the towel more firm and easier to gently fling across horizontal surfaces, using the pull-dry method. The innovative design has interior sewn edges, and center stitching, for structural integrity and durability. It comes in multiple sizes (16"x16", 20"x30", 20"x40", 30"x40") good for smaller and larger vehicles like trucks and SUV's. The twist pile design glides softly across paint glass and plastic surfaces, while absorbing completely streak free. The high pile soft and thick microfiber towel performs particularly well in windows and mirrors, and can still absorb streak free when slightly damp.
